name: BMBR
description:
Survive the longest with your trusty bomb
by killing creatures without even touching them.
To help you, you have your dash. But be careful,
it won't make you invulnerable, it'll just make you faster.

Keep yourself alive as long as possible.


- PLACE bombs to eliminate enemies.
- DASH to get away from explosions.
- DON'T let your explosions hit you.

Keybinds in the info menu.

No HTML version available due to problems with itch.io.
